asset.title: HSN | How to Use the New Miracle Mop®
asset.description:
Shop the collection at http://www.hsn.com/shop/joy-mangano/192  

Are you ready to meet the mop that made Joy famous? Nothing short of miraculous, this next generation version is durable and stronger than ever before. Versatile enough to use wet or dry, its super-absorbent braided microfiber gives you superior results, while self-wringing technology means less stress on your hands and wrists. Get the better clean you've been waiting for — experience the Joy of the Miracle Mop!
